      • srite

        public static int srite(java.lang.String tag,
        byte[] buf,
        int nvals)
        Write bytes to seplib output file.
        Parameters:
        tag - The tag (or name), e.g. "out", for the seplib output file.
        buf - Array containing data to be written to output.
        nvals - The number of bytes to write to output.
        Returns:
        The number of data values actually written or -1 on error.
